content: materials worsted weight yarn - approx 240 yards -red heart with love in terracotta pictured -red heart chic sheep by marly bird in sterling pictured crochet hook in size 6mm tunisian crochet hook in size 6mm faux fur pom pom pattern notes pattern written using us terms blo = back loop only this pattern uses the tunisian honeycomb stitch ths which alternates tunisian simple stitch tss with tunisian purl stitch tps find a video tutorial for the tunisian honeycomb stitch on hearthookhome com
